pattern.name: Leave one out
pattern.description:
The pattern is from slide number 26 of: http://www.slideshare.net/OwenZhang2/tips-for-data-science-competitions
It is for nominal attributes and numerical targets.
NOTE: IT SHOULD BE REWRITTEN TO ALSO SUPPORT BINOMIAL TARGETS (like in WoE).
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT t1.@base , coalesce((t2.suma-t1.@baseTarget)/(t2.counta-0.99) * ((random()-0.5) * 0.1 + 1), 0.5) AS "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable t1 JOIN ( SELECT @column , sum(@baseTarget) AS suma , count(@baseTarget) AS counta FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @column ) t2 ON t1.@column = t2.@column
